solution_line_template: To finish an audiobook {audiobook_length_hours} hours long, listening to {daily_listening_hours} hours of each audiobook a day, Fernanda took {audiobook_length_hours} hours / {daily_listening_hours} hours/day =<<{audiobook_length_hours}/{daily_listening_hours}={days_per_audiobook}>>{days_per_audiobook} days to finish one audiobook.

If she purchased {num_audiobooks} audiobooks, the total number of days she will take to finish all the audiobooks is {num_audiobooks} audiobooks * {days_per_audiobook} days/audiobook = <<{num_audiobooks}*{days_per_audiobook}={total_days}>>{total_days} days
